tool_description: API to convert places, addresses, locations, anything related to travel.
name: Transliteration for Travel Domain
title: Transliteration for Travel Domain

api_list.name: transliterate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-travel-domain.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-travel-domain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
